Essential softwares

Jan 14, 2006

[This post is constantly updated. Last Update - 15/1/2006]

These are the free essential softwares of my choice

          Internet
        • Firefox Browser
        • Opera Browser
        • HTTrack Website copier
        • Google Earth Search through satellite images
        • PuTTY Telnet and SSH client
        • FileZilla Fast and reliable FTP client
        • Thunderbird Excellent e-mail client

          • P2P
        • BitTorrent Official BitTorrent client
        • Emule P2P file sharing client
        • Shareaza P2P client
        • Azureus (requires Java VM)
        • µTorrent Efficient BitTorrent client
          Office
        • Adobe Reader PDF reader
        • Foxit PDF Reader PDF reader (smaller & faster)
        • AbiWord Word processor
        • OpenOffice Office suite
          VoIP
        • Skype Voip client
        • Google Talk(beta) Call & send instant messages
        • Gizmo Free phone for your computer
          System
        • Daemon Tools Virtual dvd player
        • Sisoft Sandra Lite Information & dignostic utility
        • EasyCleaner Registry & disk cleaning solution
        • TweakUI Customize Windows
        • PC Inspector File Recovery File recovery
        • Copy Handler Smart, fast & reliable copying
          Security
        • Spybot Search & Destroy Anti spyware utility
        • Ad-Aware SE Anti spyware utility
        • Microsoft Antispyware Anti spyware utility
        • ZoneAlarm Firewall
        • avast! Home Edition Anti virus utility
          Imaging
        • IrfanView Image viewer
        • Picasa Image Viewer
        • The Gimp (Requires GTK+) Photo & graphics editor
          Multimedia
        • Winamp Multimedia Player
        • RealPlayer Multimedia Player
        • Real Alternative Play RealMedia files without Real Player
        • VirtualDub Video Capture / processing
        • DivX DivX codec & Player
        • Xvid MPEG-4 compliant video codec
          Compression
        • 7–Zip Multi-format file archiver
        • Winrar Archiving utility
          Messengers
        • Yahoo! messenger(Installer) Send instant messages
        • GAIM all-in-one IM client
        • Trillion all-in-one IM client
        • MSN messenger Internet messaging service
